mapper.select: SELECT dr.daily_report_id, dr.recent_trend_title, dr.stock_trend_title,dr.created_at, dr.updated_at, sr.saved_report_id, sr.created_at as saved_at FROM DAILY_REPORT dr JOIN SAVED_REPORT sr ON dr.daily_report_id = sr.daily_report_id WHERE sr.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sr.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAVED_REPORT (daily_report_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{dailyReportId}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW())
